structured.description: A `PageInfo` class that contains information about the number of pages, size of each page, total number of pages and elements, based on a provided `Pageable` object and a passed `Page` object. The `of()` method creates a new instance of `PageInfo` using the page number, size, total pages, and total elements from the input `Pageable` and `Page` objects.

items.description: Is a data structure that encapsulates metadata about pages and their elements. It provides information such as the current page number, page size, total number of pages, and total number of elements. This class is used to return page-related metadata based on a provided Pageable object and a passed Page object.
items.name: PageInfo

items.description: Takes a `pageable` and a `page` as input, returns a `PageInfo` object with information about the page number, size, total pages, and total elements.

params.name: pageable
params.description: pagination information for the current page of data being processed, providing the page number, page size, total pages, and total elements.

params.name: page
params.description: current page being processed, providing information on its position within the overall range of pages and the total number of elements in the collection being paginated.

returns.description: a `PageInfo` object containing information about the page number, size, total pages, and total elements of a pageable.

items.name: of

structured.description: A `PageInfo` class that represents metadata about a page of results from a data source. The class has fields for the current page number, page size, total pages, and total elements. A static method `of` creates an instance of `PageInfo` from a `Pageable` object and a `Page` object.

items.description: Is a data structure used to represent information about a page of elements. It consists of four fields: currentPage, pageLimit, totalPages, and totalElements. The class provides a convenient way to create instances of PageInfo from a Pageable object and its corresponding Page.
items.name: PageInfo

items.description: Returns a `PageInfo` object containing information about the number of pages, page size, total pages, and total elements for a given `Pageable` and `Page`.

params.name: pageable
params.description: pageable object that contains information about the current page being processed, including the number of elements per page and the total number of pages in the dataset.

params.name: page
params.description: current page being processed, providing the total number of elements on that page.

returns.description: a `PageInfo` object containing page number, size, total pages, and total elements.

items.name: of
